record.title: PERMITTING THE CLERK TO MAKE TECHNICAL CHANGES IN ENGROSSING PAPERS TO H.R. 1257, SHAREHOLDER VOTE ON EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION ACT

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that the Clerk be permitted to make technical changes in the engrossing papers to conform to the Union Calendar print of the bill.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Massachusetts?
